Name: Quest of Faith
Description: Ruins litter Penitent's End where the shadows of knights wander among the crumbling walls. A faint voice floats through the sea mist, guiding your way. "Seeker, follow in the footsteps of the knights from long ago. Uncover the long-buried truth." Hidden rewards can be found in this area.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you see that? Something just fell off that spooky knight!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seems to be a scrap of paper.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait a minute... You think the TD you fought was the same one in this journal?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Ruins in the southwest," let's check it out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Slanted Etchings
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Beneath the firelight, shadow loses its refuge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Is this some sort of riddle?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Firelight"... Maybe it's related to the torches around here? And the "shadow" could beâ€”

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the same kind of knight TD. These ruins must be connected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And here come more bits and pieces!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Things were really going downhill for them! What relic were they after that was worth all this?

Options.PlotLineKey: It's still too soon to tell.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's a mark on the map for a third ruin. Let's continue following their trail.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, remember how those Fae Ignises lit up the torches at the other ruin?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe we can use that to our advantage.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Another piece of new info. What happened next for the knights?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sounds like whoever kept this journal was losing it. Dueling his own student? Ugh...

Options.PlotLineKey: They could have just talked things through.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The journal says "north"... There's no way we turn back now.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So this is the northern ruin. It's much larger than the others.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stay sharp! I smell danger in the air.
